text: A 17-year-old Plus Two girl student reportedly committed suicide by jumping into a nearby well after informing her parents that she had not done well in the maths exam on Friday. Fire and Rescue Services personnel retrieved the body and sent it to Salem Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital for post-mortem examination. The Government has provided helpline number: 104 and SNEHA, an organisation working towards the prevention of suicides: 044 2464 0050.
title: Plus-Two student ends life
